data.title: California top companies by revenue 2021
data.meta_description: In 2021, Apple was the largest publicly traded company in California based on revenue.

Supplementary notes

Data shown are for the fiscal year ended on or before Jan. 31, 2022. Unless otherwise noted, all figures are for the year ended Dec. 31, 2021.

The values were rounded for a better understanding.

Companies shown here have their headquarters in California.
